name: PlantCraft
description:
Your home is under attack by evil creatures! Gather resources and combine them to create strong plants to protect it! 

Controls: 

WASD - Move

SPACE - Interact

MOUSE - Interact with UI / drag and drop resources to craft

DevNotes:

There was a lot more I wanted to put into this game before I left on vacation but I really enjoyed the concept of this jam and the whole creation process! I'll probably try to finish up the sprites at least sometime in the near future. I'd also like to add more unique combinations and balance up the game a bit.

I totally forgot about audio this time which suuuucks.

Feedback is also very much appreciated! Thank you for playing my game! :D
